name: Couscous With Raisins and Red Peppers
keywords: couscous, raisins, red bell pepper, main course, side dish, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup sweet red peppers cut into small cubes
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan with a tight lid, heat the olive oil. Add the onions and red peppers, and cook and stir until wilted. Do not brown. Add the water, raisins, cinnamon, cumin, orange rind, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil.
Remove from the heat, add the couscous and stir well. Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Uncover, add the butter and fluff well with a fork. Serve with the tuna.
